text: Isidro Ayora Cueva (August 31, 1879 – March 22, 1978) was an Ecuadorian political figure. He was the President of Ecuador from 1926 to 1931. Isidro Ayora, a town in Guayas, and Puerto Ayora, are named after him. Some people name coins ayora because this were introduced by him. ==Other websites== * Ecuador online - Dr. Isidro Ayora Cueva * Pérez Pimentel, Rodolfo – Diccionario Enciclopédico de Ecuador - Isidro Ayora Cueva * Biografías y vidas - Isidro Ayora ==References== Category:1879 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Guayaquil
title: Isidro Ayora
